page.title: 12TRANSPORT: QUINTON
page.content: The only{public transport}to visit Quinton is a{bus service}running between{Stratford}and Chipping Campden. This operates infrequently. On Tuesdays there is a private bus to Moreton in Marsh market. {Older children,}most of whom attend Shipston on Stour High School, are carried by a local authority hired {school bus. The army does provide some extra buses for soldiers and their families. Although some people are able to travel quite widely by bicycle, most village dwellers seem to rely on {family cars for local transport. There are a number of older inhabitants who rarely travel beyond the village.
